ygData.subject: RE: On the topic of stats...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m a lvl 28 gnome necro on Povar.  Last night I took my 350plat and went into qeynos.  Bought my lvl 29 spells and still had 250pp.  Someone was selling
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I'm a lvl 28 gnome necro on Povar. Last night I took my 350plat and
went into qeynos. Bought my lvl 29 spells and still had 250pp. Someone was
selling +3int earrings so I bought a pair bringing my INT to 171. I have a
"charisma suit" which brings my charisma to 95. I would put on the suit
buy/sell parts/arrows then change back to mongo int. I went from skill 60
to skill 124 in fletching last night and only spent 100pp. I followed the
following chart for what to make.

Min Arrow To Increase Skill Cost (Based on 75 CHA)
